attributes.additional_details:
Netflix’s statement to the discussion 
“We are testing whether surfacing recommendations between episodes helps members discover stories they will enjoy faster.”
attributes.background:
When you download a game for free you will receive adverts until you pay for that game.  So why should we watch adverts when we are already paying over the odds for Netflix?!?! This defeats the object of paying. 
If Netflix are going to introduce adverts then the prices should be dropped.
